page.title: 09THEMES OF WORK IN SCHOOL.
page.content: Every term Spreyton School works on a theme but each theme usually connects with the last one. When we were studying the{Mary Rose} we visited her at Portsmouth and also worked on a simulation computer program.We found out that Mary Rose capsized because of a strong wind and this led us to the next theme which was{The Weather.}After the weather we} did {The Sun}because the sun has a great effect on the weather and the next theme was{The Planets.}We visited the planetarium at Plymouth to look at some of the constellations and we also camped out under the stars at our teacher's place.We did not actually see many stars because it was cloudy but we did see bats, owls,moths and flying,creepy crawlies which led us in to our next theme called {Flight.}
